languages.text: "Сначала оскорбление, теперь угрозы? Я вижу, вежливость и такт совсем упали в цене на Футфоле! Что ж, я найду сделку получше". {n}Развернувшись на каблуках, женщина направляется к выходу. Поравнявшись с вами, она окидывает вас стремительным взглядом, подмигивает и тут же отворачивается, взметнув смоляные волосы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Сначала оскорбление, теперь угрозы? Я вижу, вежливость и такт совсем упали в цене на Футфоле! Что ж, я найду сделку получше". {n}Развернувшись на каблуках, женщина направляется к выходу. Поравнявшись с вами, она окидывает вас стремительным взглядом, подмигивает и тут же отворачивается, взметнув смоляные волосы.{/n}

languages.text: "First an insult, and now threats? I see courtesy and tact are no longer a valued commodity on Footfall! Oh well, I'll find myself a better deal." {n}She turns on her heel and heads toward the exit. As she passes you by, she gives you a quick once-over, winks at you, then immediately turns away with a flip of her jet-black hair.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сначала оскорбление, теперь угрозы? Я вижу, вежливость и такт совсем упали в цене на Футфоле! Что ж, я найду сделку получше". {n}Развернувшись на каблуках, женщина направляется к выходу. Поравнявшись с вами, она окидывает вас стремительным взглядом, подмигивает и тут же отворачивается, взметнув смоляные волосы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "First an affront, and now threats? I see courtesy and tact are no longer a valued commodity on Footfall! Oh well, I'll find myself a better deal." {n}She turns on her heel and heads toward the exit. As she passes you by, she gives you a quick look-over, winks at you, then immediately turns away, flinging her jet-black hair in the air.{/n}

"First an affront, and now threats? I see courtesy and tact are no longer a valued commodity on Footfall! Oh well, I'll find myself a better deal." {n}She turns on her heel and heads toward the exit. As she passes you by, she gives you a quick look-over, winks at you, then immediately turns away, flinging her jet-black hair in the air.{/n}

As she passes you by, she gives you a quick once-over, winks at you, then immediately turns away with a flip of her jet-black hair.{/n}

As she passes you by, she gives you a quick once-over, winks at you, then immediately turns away with a flip of her jet-black hair.{/n}

"First an insult, and now threats? I see courtesy and tact are no longer a valued commodity on Footfall! Oh well, I'll find myself a better deal." {n}She turns on her heel and heads toward the exit. As she passes you by, she gives you a quick once-over, winks at you, then immediately turns away with a flip of her jet-black hair.{/n}

languages.text: 「最初は侮辱で次は脅迫？礼儀も分別も、今のフットフォールにはないも同然だね！いいさ、自分の手で良い取引を探すから」{n}女は踵を返すと出口へと足を進める。横を通り過ぎるときに、コチラにチラリと視線を向けてウインクを投げると、サッと漆黒の髪を指で払い、背を向けて出て行った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "First an insult, and now threats? I see courtesy and tact are no longer a valued commodity on Footfall! Oh well, I'll find myself a better deal." {n}She turns on her heel and heads toward the exit. As she passes you by, she gives you a quick once-over, winks at you, then immediately turns away with a flip of her jet-black hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「最初は侮辱で次は脅迫？礼儀も分別も、今のフットフォールにはないも同然だね！いいさ、自分の手で良い取引を探すから」{n}女は踵を返すと出口へと足を進める。横を通り過ぎるときに、コチラにチラリと視線を向けてウインクを投げると、サッと漆黒の髪を指で払い、背を向けて出て行った。{/n}

languages.text: “先是侮辱，现在又是威胁？看得出来，礼貌与机敏这种品质，在落脚港已经失去价值了！噢，行吧，我会找到更合适的买卖。”{n}她转身朝出口走去。当她经过你身边时，她快速地扫了你一眼，朝你眨眨眼，之后甩了一下乌黑的头发，离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "First an insult, and now threats? I see courtesy and tact are no longer a valued commodity on Footfall! Oh well, I'll find myself a better deal." {n}She turns on her heel and heads toward the exit. As she passes you by, she gives you a quick once-over, winks at you, then immediately turns away with a flip of her jet-black hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “先是侮辱，现在又是威胁？看得出来，礼貌与机敏这种品质，在落脚港已经失去价值了！噢，行吧，我会找到更合适的买卖。”{n}她转身朝出口走去。当她经过你身边时，她快速地扫了你一眼，朝你眨眨眼，之后甩了一下乌黑的头发，离开了。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Primero me insultas y ahora me amenazas? Ya veo que la cortesía y el tacto han dejado de ser un bien preciado en Paso. Bueno, ya encontraré algo mejor». {n}Gira sobre sus talones y se dirige hacia la salida. Al pasar a tu lado, te mira de arriba abajo, te guiña un ojo y se da la vuelta agitando su caballera negra.{/n}
languages.original_text: "First an insult, and now threats? I see courtesy and tact are no longer a valued commodity on Footfall! Oh well, I'll find myself a better deal." {n}She turns on her heel and heads toward the exit. As she passes you by, she gives you a quick once-over, winks at you, then immediately turns away with a flip of her jet-black hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Primero me insultas y ahora me amenazas? Ya veo que la cortesía y el tacto han dejado de ser un bien preciado en Paso. Bueno, ya encontraré algo mejor». {n}Gira sobre sus talones y se dirige hacia la salida. Al pasar a tu lado, te mira de arriba abajo, te guiña un ojo y se da la vuelta agitando su caballera negra.{/n}

languages.text: « D'abord, vous m'insultez et maintenant, vous me faites des menaces ? Je vois que plus personne n'apprécie l'amabilité et le tact à Castel ! Tant pis, je vais me trouver un meilleur accord. » {n}Elle tourne les talons et se dirige vers la sortie. En passant devant vous, elle vous jauge rapidement du regard et vous lance un clin d'œil, avant de se détourner en dégageant d'un geste ses cheveux noirs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "First an insult, and now threats? I see courtesy and tact are no longer a valued commodity on Footfall! Oh well, I'll find myself a better deal." {n}She turns on her heel and heads toward the exit. As she passes you by, she gives you a quick once-over, winks at you, then immediately turns away with a flip of her jet-black hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « D'abord, vous m'insultez et maintenant, vous me faites des menaces ? Je vois que plus personne n'apprécie l'amabilité et le tact à Castel ! Tant pis, je vais me trouver un meilleur accord. » {n}Elle tourne les talons et se dirige vers la sortie. En passant devant vous, elle vous jauge rapidement du regard et vous lance un clin d'œil, avant de se détourner en dégageant d'un geste ses cheveux noirs.{/n}

languages.text: "Erst eine Beleidigung und jetzt Drohungen? Ich sehe schon, Höflichkeit und Takt sind auf Footfall kein geschätztes Gut mehr! Na gut, suche ich mir eben ein besseres Geschäft." {n}Sie dreht auf dem Absatz um und geht Richtung Ausgang. Als sie an dir vorbeikommt, mustert sie dich kurz, nickt dir zu und wendet sich dann mit einem Schütteln ihrer tiefschwarzen Haare sofort ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "First an insult, and now threats? I see courtesy and tact are no longer a valued commodity on Footfall! Oh well, I'll find myself a better deal." {n}She turns on her heel and heads toward the exit. As she passes you by, she gives you a quick once-over, winks at you, then immediately turns away with a flip of her jet-black hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Erst eine Beleidigung und jetzt Drohungen? Ich sehe schon, Höflichkeit und Takt sind auf Footfall kein geschätztes Gut mehr! Na gut, suche ich mir eben ein besseres Geschäft." {n}Sie dreht auf dem Absatz um und geht Richtung Ausgang. Als sie an dir vorbeikommt, mustert sie dich kurz, nickt dir zu und wendet sich dann mit einem Schütteln ihrer tiefschwarzen Haare sofort ab.{/n}

languages.text: "Önce hakaret, şimdi de tehdit mi? Görüyorum ki Binliman'da nezaket de incelik de tedavülden kalkmış! Hıh, bana anlaşma mı yok?" {n}Topuğunun üzerinde dönüp çıkışa yöneliyor. Yanından geçerken seni hızlıca süzüyor, göz kırpıyor, sonra da simsiyah saçlarını savurarak geçip gidiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "First an insult, and now threats? I see courtesy and tact are no longer a valued commodity on Footfall! Oh well, I'll find myself a better deal." {n}She turns on her heel and heads toward the exit. As she passes you by, she gives you a quick once-over, winks at you, then immediately turns away with a flip of her jet-black hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Önce hakaret, şimdi de tehdit mi ediyorsun? Görüyorum ki ne nezaket kalmış Binliman'da ne de incelik! Hıh, kendime daha iyisini bulurum ben de." {n}Topuğunun üzerinde dönüp çıkışa yöneliyor. Yanından geçerken seni hızlıca bir süzüyor, göz kırpıyor, sonra da simsiyah saçlarını savurarak dönüp gidiyor.{/n}
